item.title: ICOM6012 Lecture 1 Overview
item.description: ICOM6012 Internet Infrastructure Technologies Lecture 1 Overview Internet’s Birthday: Sept. 2 or Oct. 29, 1969. ARPANET (1969 -) TCP protocol in 1974 “Internet = Internetworking” NSFNET (1986 -) The Internet (late 1980s) Some Interesting Topics about Internet (More than Technical) Who controls the Internet?
